venue.address_1: 10 Derby Square, (Next to Old Town Hall, Off Front Street)
venue.name: A Beautiful Corset

item.description:
Does a CORSET FASHION Photography Shoot  & refreshments sound like fun?

So much happening in downtown Salem thanks to “Salem First Friday” where many downtown Salem businesses will stay open until at least 8 p.m. on the First Friday of every month. Businesses will host special events and entertainment, offer discounts and promotions. Check out www.salemfirstfriday.com to see what's going on around t

 

 

I just found out about a fashion photo shoot with models who will show corsets at a special event opened to the public from 7 - 9PM.

This is a participating store listed with First Friday Event  complete with wine & hor d'oeveres....Corsets more than just a great Halloween accessory for your sexy period/fantasy costume but also fantastic accessory for Christmas Parties, Christmas in Salem, New Year's Eve, Steampunk Events and of course, intimate apparel for your boudoir.

 

Website for the Photo Shoot at A Beautiful Corset & $50 off coupon event click here

Please check this website www.abeautifulcorset.com : http://www.yelp.com/biz/a-beautiful-corset-salem-2for updates.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be standing by the door greeting girls, wearing a corset of course!
item.name: Girls' Night Out & Other "Salem First Friday" Events
